birth_place.zh-cn: 中华民国山西省武乡县
birth_place.en: Wuxiang County, Shanxi Province, Republic of China

death_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党及中华人民共和国政治人物，原副国级党和国家领导人。活跃于“文化大革命”中后期及“后毛泽东时代”，曾任国务院副总理、中央政法小组组长等职。因深受毛泽东赏识和培养，在文革中后期进入中央核心。中共十一届三中全会后在政治上受到排挤，于1980年2月辞去所有职务。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a former Vice-national level leader. He was active in the late stage of the Cultural Revolution and the post-Mao era. He served as Vice Premier of the State Council and head of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Group. Highly appreciated and cultivated by Mao Zedong, he entered the central core leadership in the late Cultural Revolution. After the Third Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the CPC, he was politically marginalized and resigned from all his positions in February 1980.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。其在晚年赏识并大力提拔了纪登奎。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China. In his later years, he appreciated and greatly promoted Ji Dengkui.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一。在庐山会议后与毛泽东分歧加剧，后倒台。毛泽东曾任命纪登奎进入军委以牵制他。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China and one of the former main leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. His disagreements with Mao Zedong intensified after the Lushan Conference, leading to his downfall. Mao Zedong appointed Ji Dengkui to the military commission to counterbalance him.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物。在其掌权后，纪登奎等被视为“凡是派”的人物受到排挤。
description.en: The core figure of the second-generation central leadership of the Communist Party of China. After he came to power, figures like Ji Dengkui, who were considered part of the 'Whatever Faction', were marginalized.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国共产党中央委员会主席、中华人民共和国国务院总理。毛泽东逝世后，其领导粉碎“四人帮”。纪登奎在政治上拥护华国锋。
description.en: Former Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. After Mao Zedong's death, he led the move to smash the 'Gang of Four'. Ji Dengkui politically supported Hua Guofeng.

description.zh-cn: 纪登奎的妻子。
description.en: Spouse of Ji Dengkui.

description.zh-cn: 纪登奎的儿子。
description.en: Son of Ji Dengkui.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的政治运动。纪登奎是该运动中后期被提拔并进入中央核心的活跃政治人物。
description.en: A political movement initiated and led by Mao Zedong. Ji Dengkui was an active political figure who was promoted to the central core during the middle and late stages of this movement.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命初期上海造反派夺取上海市党政大权的事件。在此背景下，纪登奎也受到冲击被关押。
description.en: An event during the early Cultural Revolution where rebels seized power from the Shanghai municipal party and government. In this context, Ji Dengkui was also impacted and detained.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第三次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第三次全体会议
en: Third Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党历史上的重要会议，标志着邓小平时代的开启。会上，纪登奎等人受到批评，并被边缘化。
description.en: A significant meeting in the history of the CPC, marking the beginning of the Deng Xiaoping era. At the meeting, Ji Dengkui and others were criticized and marginalized.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第五次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第五次全体会议
en: Fifth Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的会议，会上决定批准纪登奎辞去其在党和国家的所有领导职务。
description.en: A meeting of the CPC, at which the decision was made to approve Ji Dengkui's resignation from all his leadership positions in the Party and the state.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国山西省，是纪登奎的出生地。
description.en: A county in Shanxi Province, China, and the birthplace of Ji Dengkui.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府。
description.en: The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China.

en: Politburo of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的常设领导机构。
description.en: The permanent leading body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 指中国文化大革命后期王洪文、张春桥、江青、姚文元在中共中央政治局内结成的政治集团。
description.en: A political faction within the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee during the later stages of the Cultural Revolution, consisting of Wang Hongwen, Zhang Chunqiao, Jiang Qing, and Yao Wenyuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 纪登奎于1938年4月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Ji Dengkui joined the Communist Party of China in April 1938.

description.zh-cn: 纪登奎出生于山西省武乡县。
description.en: Ji Dengkui was born in Wuxiang County, Shanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 王纯是纪登奎的妻子。
description.en: Wang Chun was the spouse of Ji Dengkui.

description.zh-cn: 纪坡民是纪登奎的儿子。
description.en: Ji Pomin is the son of Ji Dengkui.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 纪登奎于1975年1月至1980年4月担任中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Ji Dengkui served as Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China from January 1975 to April 1980.

description.zh-cn: 纪登奎于1969年6月至1973年8月任中共中央政治局候补委员，1973年8月至1980年2月任委员。
description.en: Ji Dengkui served as an Alternate Member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee from June 1969 to August 1973, and as a full Member from August 1973 to February 1980.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东晚年赏识和培养纪登奎，称其为“老朋友”，并将其从地方提拔至中央核心领导层。
description.en: In his later years, Mao Zedong appreciated and cultivated Ji Dengkui, calling him an 'old friend' and promoting him from local government to the central core leadership.

description.zh-cn: 纪登奎在文化大革命期间获得毛泽东提拔，进入中央核心，成为活跃的政治人物。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Ji Dengkui was promoted by Mao Zedong, entered the central leadership core, and became an active political figure.

description.zh-cn: 在“一月风暴”的背景下，纪登奎受到冲击，被关押了起来。
description.en: In the context of the 'January Storm', Ji Dengkui was impacted and detained.

description.zh-cn: 庐山会议后，毛泽东任命无军队任职经验的纪登奎进入军委办事组，意在“掺沙子”以牵制林彪，两人形成政治对立关系。
description.en: After the Lushan Conference, Mao Zedong appointed Ji Dengkui, who had no military experience, to the Military Commission's administrative group, intending to 'mix in sand' to counterbalance Lin Biao, thus creating a political rivalry between them.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在中共十一届三中全会后掌握实权，纪登奎作为被视为“凡是派”的代表人物之一，在政治上受到指责、被边缘化，并最终辞去所有职务。
description.en: After Deng Xiaoping gained power following the Third Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee, Ji Dengkui, as a representative of the 'Whatever Faction', was politically criticized, marginalized, and ultimately resigned from all his posts.

description.zh-cn: “文革”结束后，纪登奎在政治上拥护华国锋。
description.en: After the end of the Cultural Revolution, Ji Dengkui politically supported Hua Guofeng.

description.zh-cn: 在讨论隔离审查“四人帮”的文件时，纪登奎提出应在文件中指出“文革”的错误，表明其对“四人帮”路线的否定态度。
description.en: When discussing the document for the quarantine and investigation of the 'Gang of Four', Ji Dengkui proposed that the errors of the 'Cultural Revolution' should be pointed out in the document, indicating his negative stance on the 'Gang of Four's' line.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第三次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 在此次会议上，纪登奎等人因其“凡是派”立场受到批评，此后在政治上被边缘化。
description.en: At this meeting, Ji Dengkui and others were criticized for their 'Whatever Faction' stance and were subsequently marginalized politically.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第五次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 在此次会议上，纪登奎正式辞去了所担任的所有领导职务。
description.en: At this meeting, Ji Dengkui formally resigned from all the leadership positions he held.
